title: Spellcasting Ability
content: ht Patron, Zeal Domain Freedom of Movement Lvl 4 Abjuration ActionLevel 4 Spell Slot No Target's movement is unaffected by difficult terrain, spells or water. Bard, Cleric, War Domain, Druid, Circle of the Arctic, Circle of the Coast, Circle of the Forest, Circle of the Grassland, Circle of the Swamp, Oath of Devotion, Ranger, Zeal Domain Grasping Vine Lvl 4 Conjuration ActionLevel 4 Spell Slot Yes The target must succeed on a Dex. save or be pulled 20 ft toward the vine.
